data.name: CreateDashboardStagingPriority35
ReadCseOrganization
data.value: select ORGANZTN_ID, TYPE_CODE from CKT_CSE_ORGANIZATN where TYPE_CODE = 'J' order by ORGANZTN_ID

data.name: ReadDashboardStagingPriority1
data.value: select REPORT_MONTH, REPORT_LEVEL, REPORT_LEVEL_ID, AS_OF_DATE, IW_ISSUED from CKT_DB_STAGE_PRI35 where REPORT_MONTH = @reportMonth and REPORT_LEVEL = 'JD'

data.name: ReadDashboardStagingPriority2
data.value: select REPORT_MONTH, REPORT_LEVEL, REPORT_LEVEL_ID, AS_OF_DATE, IW_ISSUED from CKT_DB_STAGE_PRI35 with(xlock) where REPORT_MONTH = @reportMonth and REPORT_LEVEL = @reportLevel and REPORT_LEVEL_ID = @reportLevelId

data.name: ReadLegalActionFipsTribunal
data.value: select * from ( select LEGAL_ACTION_ID, CLASSIFICATION, ACTION_TAKEN, FILED_DT, STANDARD_NO, CREATED_TSTAMP, TRB_ID from CKT_LEGAL_ACTION where (CREATED_TSTAMP between cast(@timestamp1 as datetime2) and cast(@timestamp2 as datetime2)) and CREATED_TSTAMP < @createdTstamp and CLASSIFICATION = 'I' and (ACTION_TAKEN in ('ORDIWO2', 'ORDIWO2A', 'ORDIWO2B')) ) S1 cross apply ( select top(1) FIP_STATE, FIP_COUNTY, FIP_LOCATION, TRIBUNAL_NM, JUDICIAL_DISTRICT, IDENTIFIER from CKT_TRIBUNAL where IDENTIFIER = S1.TRB_ID and FIP_LOCATION is not null and FIP_COUNTY is not null and FIP_STATE is not null and FIP_COUNTY > 0 ) S2 order by S1.CREATED_TSTAMP desc

data.name: ReadLegalActionIncomeSourceCsePerson
data.value: select T1.CSP_NUMBER, T1.LGA_IDENTIFIER, T1.ISR_IDENTIFIER, T1.END_DT, T1.IDENTIFIER from CKT_LEGAL_ACT_ISRC T1 where @lgaIdentifier = T1.LGA_IDENTIFIER and exists ( select * from CKT_INCOME_SOURCE T3 where T3.CSP_I_NUMBER = T1.CSP_NUMBER and T3.IDENTIFIER = T1.ISR_IDENTIFIER and T3.EMP_ID is not null and T3.TYPE = 'E' ) order by T1.END_DT desc

data.name: UpdateDashboardStagingPriority35
data.value: update CKT_DB_STAGE_PRI35 set AS_OF_DATE = @asOfDate, IW_ISSUED = @iwIssued where REPORT_MONTH = @reportMonth and REPORT_LEVEL = @reportLevel and REPORT_LEVEL_ID = @reportLevelId
